title: Chroma Packs + Popstar Ahri
body: Not sure if I'm the only one, but I (and maybe many others) would really like one of those new Chroma packs for Popstar Ahri {{champion:103}} . Not saying its a bad skin at all, its one of my favourites, but the pink does get a bit boring after a time. Something to change the colour of her tails/outfit/hair/etc. (the usual stuff that chroma packs would change). Community support anyone?

replies.body:
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/31vuh0/hi_im_creating_whatever_chroma_you_can_want_for/

Have a look at the night blue Challenger Ahri one if you own her, i know i do, and i think it looks awesome as a nightblue color (i own both Popstar and Challenger as a friend gifted me challenger.)

EDIT: Chroma mega thread is here, might be one in there as well

http://www.reddit.com/r/ChromaRequest/comments/321yj4/chroma_megathread/
They're cheaper than if a single one was 300rp. I think it's a good idea to pack them as 3.
I really hope nobody buys one unless the price is closer to 300-400 RP OR riot give you the choice of the 750RP AND something like 3150 IP.
